Container.Name: deltabadger-aio
Container.Overview: Deltabadger is a self-hosted Dollar Cost Averaging (DCA) bot for cryptocurrency. Automate recurring purchases across multiple exchanges including Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, Bitstamp, Gemini, KuCoin, and more. This All-in-One container includes PostgreSQL, Redis, and all required services - no external dependencies needed.

Config.Name: Data Storage
Config.Description: Persistent data storage for PostgreSQL, Redis, and app secrets

Config.Name: App URL
Config.Description: Change localhost to your Unraid IP (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:3742). Keep port 3000 internally.
